Detailed Description

Holds the components that provide access to the bound window subsystem.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void omi::runtime::ss::WindowSubsystem::release ( )
virtual

Unbinds the subsystem from Omicron and shuts it down.

Warning
This should close the dynamic library, this is done by the SubsystemManager.

Implements omi::runtime::ss::AbstractSubsystem.
